channel.title: Weekly on DJ IHaveAHat
channel.description: Recent content in Weekly on DJ IHaveAHat

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (24#01)
item.description: Heyhey everyone, long time no see, but dropping by again to bring you a selection of songs that caught my eye this time round. Hope you enjoy!

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (18#01)
item.description: Look who’s still alive (spoiler: it’s me). Felt the urge to mix something again, so here it is!

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (17#52)
item.description: Ending the year with some wonderful euphoric hardstyle vibes, focusing on my favourites, but with some new sounds as well, happy new year!

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (17#51)
item.description: Speeding things up but keeping ’em uplifting, let’s head into an hour of UK Hardcore!

item.title: Handsup Mix (17#50)
item.description: Time for some uplifting melodies, with some handsup

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#49)
item.description: Still playing a game of catch(-up), so catch these raw hard beats!

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#48)
item.description: It’s been a while, but let’s catch up on the last few sets of the year starting off with some euphoric vibes!

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#47)
item.description: The ting goes skra, and so does this raw hardstyle set, enjoy!

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#46)
item.description: Another euphoric hardstyle set for the dark & gloomy winter, and just because I can.

item.title: Handsup Mix (17#45)
item.description: Put your hands up for an hour of handsup goodness!

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#44)
item.description: We’re going raw & hard this week, bringing you an hour of raw hardstyle!

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#43)
item.description: For those dark & gloomy days, music is the answer. Especially when it’s an hour of euphoric hardstyle beats & melodies!

item.title: House Mix (17#42)
item.description: Let’s have another set of house music, because why not.

item.title: Gabber Mix (17#41)
item.description: I had a blast making this mix, so enjoy this hour of banging gabber beats with some frenchcore at the end

item.title: House Mix (17#40)
item.description: This week we’re slowing things down with a varied set of house music.

item.title: Handsup Mix (17#39)
item.description: Another week, another genre, another hour of uplifting handsup sounds.

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (17#38)
item.description: This week we’re bringing you sounds from all across the hardstyle spectrum, melodic, euphoric, raw & more!

item.title: A Bit Of Everything Mix (17#37)
item.description: Why have one genre when you can have ALL the genres, and that’s exactly what we have this week! A journey from slow to fast through various styles of dance music.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#36)
item.description: In this week’s set we’ve got an hour of raw hardstyle screeches, kicks, melodies & more.

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (17#35)
item.description: Another hour of hardstyle filled with old and new tunes from all across the spectrum, with a focus on the euphoric, enjoy!

item.title: Handsup Mix (17#34)
item.description: This week we’re bringing an hour of uplifting handsup tunes, remixes and bootlegs!

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#33)
item.description: Another week, another set. This week we’re bringing you an hour of raw hardstyle beats & melodies

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (17#32)
item.description: This week we’re bringing you beats from all across the hardstyle spectrum, raw, euphoric & whatever falls inbetween

item.title: Drum & Bass Mix (17#31)
item.description: I’ve been wanting to record a drum & bass set for a long time now, here it finally is!

item.title: Da Tweekaz Showcase Mix (17#30)
item.description: Known by pretty much everyone already, this week’s set showcases some of the best of Da Tweekaz, but mostly it was just a good excuse to play a lot of their tracks.

item.title: House & Subground Mix (17#29)
item.description: This week we’re returning to you at a slower tempo, with an hour of Electro House, Melbourne Bounce, Subground & more.

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (17#28)
item.description: Returning to the UK Hardcore sound with a set full of, well some of everything really.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#27)
item.description: This week we’re returning to raw hardstyle sounds with an hour of heavy beats and raw melodies.

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#26)
item.description: This week we’re hitting you with an hour of awesome euphoric hardstyle beats & melodies!

item.title: Electro & Bigroom House Mix (17#25)
item.description: Not quite an hour, but just as much Electro & Bigroom House to enjoy in this week’s 45 minute set!

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#24)
item.description: This week we’ve got euphoric tracks and uplifting remixes & bootlegs for you, in an hour of euphoric hardstyle goodness

item.title: Gabber Mix (17#23)
item.description: This week we’re returning to the wonderful world of Gabber with an hour of awesome beats and melodies

item.title: Handsup Mix (17#22)
item.description: Put your hands up for this week’s handsup filled hour of cheese, remixes and more!

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#21)
item.description: The sun is shining & temperatures are rising, let’s complement that with an hour of euphoric beats and melodies.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#20)
item.description: Here comes the bass train, with this week’s hard hitting set, chock-full of the latest and greatest raw hardstyle tracks

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#19)
item.description: Back on that euphoric vibe, with another hour of uplifting hardstyle beats & melodies

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (17#18)
item.description: This week’s set is packed with high energy uptempo UK Hardcore beats

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#17)
item.description: Crashing in with an hour of raw hardstyle, we’re going all out on the hard & heavy this week, with some melodic influences here and there.

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#16)
item.description: Back on that euphoric 150BPM (secretly 155) vibe with an hour of euphoric hardstyle

item.title: Electro & Bigroom House Mix (17#15)
item.description: This week we’ve got a back & forth between heavy and uplifting through the combination of electro & bigroom house

item.title: Frenchcore Mix (17#14)
item.description: And now for something completely different, our first ever frenchcore mix, coming in at a whopping 200BPM we have a set filled with remixed pop classics and more!

item.title: Handsup Mix (17#13)
item.description: Less of the same! This week we have a handsup set featuring some great remixes and tracks.

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#12)
item.description: Seeing the trend this year, it’s easy to see Hardstyle is my first love. So, let’s continue that with another hour of euphoric beats & melodies!

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#11)
item.description: We’ve got a great line-up of tracks for you this week, with cheesy, melodic and just plain loud raw hardstyle

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (17#10)
item.description: This week’s mix is filled with high energy euphoric beats & melodies

item.title: Euphoric & Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#09)
item.description: Let’s have an hour of euphoric beats to brighten up our day after a dark and gloomy week.

item.title: Handsup Mix (17#08)
item.description: An hour of uplifting, energetic & cheesy handsup songs and remixes

item.title: Trance Mix (17#07)
item.description: It’s not a common occurence, but we’ve got another trance mix! Enjoy!

item.title: Oldskool Nustyle Mix (17#06)
item.description: The ubiqitous pitch-shifting kicks we hear nowadays, used to be known as nustyle kicks, this mix features a selection of songs from the earlier days of this sound

item.title: Handsup Mix (17#05)
item.description: An hour of high energy handsup beats with some added cheese for good measure

item.title: Electro & Bigroom House Mix (17#04)
item.description: This week we have a nice blend of electro, bigroom and probably some other subgenres of house.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#03)
item.description: Enough of those uplifting melodies for now, time for some hard raw beats in this week’s raw hardstyle mix

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (17#02)
item.description: In the 2nd week of this new chapter it’s time for an hour of euphoric (and other) hardstyle

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (17#01)
item.description: New year, new covers, new logo, new UK Hardcore mix

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-12-25)
item.description: I originally wanted to do a christmas mix, but I couldn’t get enough songs together. So instead we have a handsup mix with some christmas flavours, merry christmas!

item.title: Gabber Mix (2016-12-13)
item.description: A wide variety of gabber sounds in this week’s mix

item.title: Electro House Mix (2016-12-10)
item.description: Today’s mix is an attempt to not have the single cookie cutter EDM sound, and have an hour of (at least somewhat) varied electro house.

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (2016-12-01)
item.description: Today we’re raving into December with an hour of euphoric hardstyle beats

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (2016-11-26)
item.description: This week we have a bouncy and cheesy UK Hardcore mix

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-11-18)
item.description: Slowing it down from last week, but still full of energy we’re rolling into an hour of handsup beats

item.title: S3RL Showcase Mix (2016-11-08)
item.description: This week we’re showcasing the amazing, cheesy DJ S3RL, hell, there isn’t a single track of his I dislike. Regardless, if you enjoy any of his tracks, you can buy em and support the scene: https://www.beatport.com/artist/s3rl/136015/tracks

item.title: Raw & Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (2016-11-03)
item.description: This week we’re starting with uplifting euphoric melodies moving through to raw and heavy beats at the end

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-10-28)
item.description: Uplifting and full of energy, that’s the basis of this week’s handsup mix

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (2016-10-18)
item.description: We’re bringing hard hitting beats and melodic flavours in this week’s raw hardstyle mix

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (2016-10-14)
item.description: This week an hour of uplifting & euphoric beats

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-10-06)
item.description: A mix of mainstream and euphoric hardstyle, with a familiar (remixed) intro

item.title: Gabber Mix (2016-09-29)
item.description: An hour of high energy melodic sounds, in this week’s gabber mix

item.title: Electro & Bigroom House Mix (2016-09-22)
item.description: A blend of two genres this week, as we move through electro & bigroom house

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-09-17)
item.description: A week of uplifting euphoric sounds with some harder variations throughout.

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-09-11)
item.description: Lots of familiar sounds this week, during an hour of handsup remixes and more.

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-09-03)
item.description: This week we’re returning to the harder styles, ending with some raw, including DJ Thera’s new banger: Hyperspace.

item.title: Chill House Mix (2016-08-25)
item.description: With the hot weather over here we’re slowing things down with some chill house

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (2016-08-18)
item.description: This week we’re sending out some happy vibes @ 175BPM with this UK Hardcore Mix

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-08-11)
item.description: This week’s mix consists of a variety of Hardstyle, with a focus on uplifting and euphoric beats

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (2016-08-07)
item.description: Upping the tempo to a steady 175BPM as we dive into the UK Hardcore scene

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (2016-07-30)
item.description: And to end the week, some fistpumping, body rocking raw hardstyle

item.title: Electro House Mix (2016-07-28)
item.description: The first of this week’s mixes, a bangin’ collection of great electro house

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-07-14)
item.description: Another great set of tracks this week, as we go into another handsup mix

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-07-10)
item.description: I’ve got quite the collection of handsup now, so working through the best ones as we go, enjoy!

item.title: House Mix (2016-06-30)
item.description: In this week’s mix we have a collection of great electro and bigroom house tracks, and we end with an awesome mash-up

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-06-24)
item.description: It’s been a while, but I’ve finally gathered enough tracks for another handsup mix, so here it is!

item.title: Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (2016-06-18)
item.description: Time for some euphoric #GoodVibes

item.title: Gabber Mix (2016-06-10)
item.description: East to west, this week we’re bringing you another Gabber mix ranging from J-Core to western mainstream.

item.title: House Mix (2016-06-02)
item.description: We’ve got a variety of house music this week, some electro, some bigroom, and some other.

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-05-29)
item.description: This week we get back into Hardstyle, jumping into raw about halfway through, while we also revisit some older tracks, enjoy!

item.title: Trance Mix (2016-05-21)
item.description: And now for something completely different, Trance! Really enjoyed mixing this one, something different from the usual.

item.title: Gabber Mix (2016-05-10)
item.description: This week we return to the harder styles, with a gabber mix.

item.title: Bassline House Mix (2016-05-05)
item.description: After last week’s raw and hard mix something a bit lighter.

item.title: Melodic Rawstyle Mix (2016-04-30)
item.description: Another week, another mix. Raw and melodic, a wonderful combination, especially if you need a break from the usual screechfest.

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-04-24)
item.description: The thing, it has been done. Hardstyle mix this week, unexpectedly long, very last minute.

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (2016-04-09)
item.description: This week we’re jumping into UK Hardcore, with a twist at the end.

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-04-03)
item.description: And back on track, another Hardstyle mix, enjoy!

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-03-19)
item.description: Some old, some new, some well known, some less known, enjoy!

item.title: Handsup & UK Hardcore Mix (2016-03-09)
item.description: Another week, another mix, this time not at the last minute. Enjoy!

item.title: Gabber Mix (2016-03-06)
item.description: Mixed some older, not quite oldschool Gabber tracks, still bangin'.

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-02-26)
item.description: A little late, but as promised, last week’s mix, a lotta handsup bootlegs.

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-02-18)
item.description: Grabbed a whole bunch of new tracks, enjoy!

item.title: House Mix (2016-02-02)
item.description: Bit late with the upload, but the mix for this week, various house tracks, don’t ask me which subgenres because house subgenres are weird.

item.title: Handsup Mix (2016-01-26)
item.description: Another week, another mix, enjoy some handsup!

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (2016-01-20)
item.description: Trying to get back into the swing of things, goal to create at least 1 mix a week.

item.title: UK Hardcore Mix (2016-01-02)
item.description: And here’s the UK (Happy?) Hardcore mix I uploaded last week.
